pages.text: 这个方块有两种功能：加热周围的水并驱散水中任何的blend。事实上这意味着In practice it means that when it is active it will repeatedly apply effect of a blend to any creature in water around it. To function it requires any kind of burnable fuel and a bathing blend. This block has two slots. In lower you need to load fuel and in top slot you need to load bathing blend.
Blends are items that similar in effect with potions but unlike potions you are not suppose to ingest them, but instead apply externally. All methods of contacting a spirit require appropriate blend
$(item)热水器$()合成表。你还需要建造一个浴池来使用它。请参阅后面页面中的示例。但要记住，这些建筑不是必须的，它们只是一些例子。
